column1: echo ¦cd¦/home/jedi && git clone https://github.com/raspberrypi/tools.git && mv tools rpi-toolchain && cd rpi-toolchain && git checkout b65595ffb74e5853ba61916f49bdbccfc54f1300 && echo "export PI_TOOLS_HOME=$HOME/rpi-toolchain" >> ~/.bashrc :: Filesystem_operation
echo ¦useradd¦jedi --create-home --password jedi && echo "jedi:jedi" | chpasswd && adduser jedi sudo :: Filesystem_operation
